jibe.sdk.client.video
Class VideoRenderer

java.lang.Object
  jibe.sdk.client.video.VideoRenderer

public class VideoRenderer
extends java.lang.Object

Video renderer, used to draw video frames to a display surface.

A client application will typically pass an instance of this class to the SDK when accepting a video session.

See Also:
VideoSharingService#acceptVideoSharingSession(long, IVideoSink).
